4   
5   
6   package net.sourceforge.pmd.typeresolution.testdata;
7   
8   
9   import net.sourceforge.pmd.typeresolution.testdata.dummytypes.SuperClassA;
10  import net.sourceforge.pmd.typeresolution.testdata.dummytypes.SuperClassA2;
11  import net.sourceforge.pmd.typeresolution.testdata.dummytypes.SuperClassB;
12  
13  
14  /*
15   * Note: inherited fields of a nested class shadow outer scope variables
16   *      Note: only if they are accessible!
17   */
18  public class FieldAccessSuper extends SuperClassA {
19      public void foo() {
20          // simple super field access
21          // Primary[Prefix[Name[s]]]
22          s = new SuperClassA();
23  
24          // access inherited field through primary
25          // Primary[ Prefix[Primary[(this)]], Suffix[s], Suffix[s2] ]
26          (this).s.s2 = new SuperClassA2();
27  
28          // access inherited field, second 's' has inherited field 's2'
29          // Primary[Prefix[Name[s.s.s2]]]
30          s.s.s2 = new SuperClassA2();
31  
32          // field access through super
33          // Primary[Prefix["super"], Suffix["field"]]
34          super.s = new SuperClassA();
35  
36          // fully qualified case
37          // Primary[Prefix[Name[net...FieldAccessSuper]], Suffix[this], Suffix[s]]
38          net.sourceforge.pmd.typeresolution.testdata.FieldAccessSuper.this.s
39                  = new SuperClassA();
40      }
41  
42      public class Nested extends SuperClassB {
43          SuperClassA a;
44  
45          public void foo() {
46              // access enclosing super field
47              // Primary[Prefix[Name[s]]]
48              s = new SuperClassA();
49  
50              // access Nested inherited field
51              // Primary[Prefix[Name[bs]]]
52              bs = new SuperClassB();
53  
54              // access super field with fully qualified stuff
55              // Primary[Prefix["FieldAccessSuper"], Suffix[Nested],
56              //                  Suffix["super"], Suffix["bs"]]
57              FieldAccessSuper.Nested.super.bs = new SuperClassB();
58  
59              // refers to the enclosing class's immediate super class's field
60              // Primary[Prefix["FieldAccessSuper"], Suffix["super"], Suffix["s"]]
61              FieldAccessSuper.super.s = new SuperClassA();
62          }
63      }
64  }
